data:
Based on the information provided, the following features are not explicitly mentioned as being included in the scope of PREVENT-IA:

* Gamification of learning experience
* Integration with existing HR systems
* Mobile application for learning on-the-go
* Multi-language support
* Virtual reality simulations for hands-on training
* Social learning features (e.g. forums, discussion boards)
* Offline access to course materials
* Customizable branding for company-specific training
* Integration with wearable devices for real-time safety monitoring
* Analytics for tracking individual progress and performance
* Collaborative learning features (e.g. group projects, team challenges)
* Adaptive learning algorithms for personalized content recommendations
* Integration with enterprise messaging systems (e.g. Slack, Microsoft Teams)
* Automated scheduling and reminders for training deadlines
* Integration with performance management systems for tracking safety-related KPIs
* Customizable reporting and analytics for company-specific metrics
* Integration with third-party content providers for additional training resources
* Accessibility features for users with disabilities (e.g. screen reader support, closed captions)
* Virtual coaching and mentoring for learners.
